attributes.action: ensure Recruitment Agency Consultants are qualified in finding work for temps.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Working for a recruitment agency can be very handy when you can't find a good permanent job, but how can you be sure the 'consultants' know what they are doing.

I have worked for many local agencies and not one of them has given me faith in the process they put you through.  

Many times I have gone to an assignment and the work bears no resemblance to the description I was given from the agency.

If you apply for a job, you need relevant qualifications or experience.

There doesn't seem to be any requirments for working as a consultant for a  recruitment agency.

Surely a basic HR qualification should the standard?

Please Prime Minister, give the temporary workforce of the UK some faith that they are getting help from people who know what they are doing.
